title: Zoom in
body: Can squeek in a option in the new client to be able to change or debind the zoom. I noticed that a lot of games already have that option so it would be if league of legends could get too.

replies.body:
The new client only changes what you experience prior to loading into the game, therefore it should in no way deal with options in-game, UI, or hotkey options.

Since this is a suggestion, I recommend posting it to the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), since Help & Support is more a channel for assistance. Let me know if you have any other questions.
